DOC.brief_title: The Effect Educational Intervention Delivery Type Selection Pregnant Women Kermanshah , Iran
DOC.detailed_description: In experimental research , 100 nulliparous pregnant woman gestational age 28-36 week refer health care center Kermanshah ( western Iran ) randomly select take Written Informed Consent letter , assign case control group . The inclusion criterion consist nulliparous pregnant woman gestational age 28-36 week , woman 35 year old , contraindication normal childbirth . Exclusion criterion include absence woman continuous training session , premature delivery , maternal unavailability completion questionnaire . Three Training session last one hour twenty day hold case group . The first session conduct affect attitude provide favourable attitude towards natural delivery . The second session allocate present feasible method reduce pain order enhance mother ' perceived behavioral control . In 3rd session method exercise practically could better employ whenever needed parturition . As result , mother ' selection sort delivery checked . In order influence subjective norm , pregnant woman also ask transfer knowledge husband . The control group also receive routine training session midwives health care center . In one-hour training session ; 45 minute dedicate listen lecture , colloquy , discuss method via use teach aid pamphlet , manual . The last 15 minute allocate summarize issue answer mother ' question . At end training session , post-test administer group data analyzed .
DOC.criteria: consist nulliparous pregnant woman gestational age 2836 week , woman 35 year old , informed consent mother husband , contraindication normal childbirth . Included absence woman continuous training session , premature delivery , maternal unavailability completion questionnaire .
